# Datthu UI

> Beautifully designed landing page components built with React & Tailwind CSS.

This file provides LLM-friendly entry points to documentation and examples.

## Components

- [fade-up-word](https://ui.datthu.site/docs/components/fade-up-word): A fade-up-word component.
- [gradient-slide-button](https://ui.datthu.site/docs/components/gradient-slide-button): A gradient-slide-button component.
- [gradual-spacing-text](https://ui.datthu.site/docs/components/gradual-spacing-text): A gradual spacing text component.
- [ipad](https://ui.datthu.site/docs/components/ipad): An iPad SVG component.
- [macbook-pro](https://ui.datthu.site/docs/components/macbook-pro): A MacBook Pro SVG component.
- [safari-browser](https://ui.datthu.site/docs/components/safari-browser): A safari browser component.
- [squiggle-arrow](https://ui.datthu.site/docs/components/squiggle-arrow): A squiggle arrow component.

## Examples

- [safari-browser-demo](https://github.com/Sridatthu/datthuui/blob/main/example/safari-browser-demo.tsx): Example usage
- [ipad-demo](https://github.com/Sridatthu/datthuui/blob/main/example/ipad-demo.tsx): Example usage
- [gradual-spacing-text-demo](https://github.com/Sridatthu/datthuui/blob/main/example/gradual-spacing-text-demo.tsx): Example usage
- [macbook-pro-demo](https://github.com/Sridatthu/datthuui/blob/main/example/macbook-pro-demo.tsx): Example usage
- [fade-up-word-demo](https://github.com/Sridatthu/datthuui/blob/main/example/fade-up-word-demo.tsx): Example usage
- [gradient-slide-button-demo](https://github.com/Sridatthu/datthuui/blob/main/example/gradient-slide-button-demo.tsx): Example usage
- [squiggle-arrow-demo](https://github.com/Sridatthu/datthuui/blob/main/example/squiggle-arrow-demo.tsx): Example usage

## Optional

- [Repository](https://github.com/Sridatthu/datthuui): Source code and issues
- [Sitemap](https://ui.datthu.site/sitemap.xml): Indexable pages
